channel.title: I GOT IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER? help please
channel.description: i cant log on cuz im ipbanned and im not listed under ipbans in the ipban logg SOme guy ip banned me idk how help please

item.title: I GOT IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER? help please
item.dc:creator: @concript concript
item.description:
@concript wrote:

Just SERVER FOLDER>Data>Bans>Ipbanned****>remove ur IP.
Im not sure if u need to compile since its txt, but i had to restart server before it took effect.

Read full topic

item.source: I GOT IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER? help please

item.title: I GOT IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER? help please
item.dc:creator: @theunderdog5 theunderdog5
item.description:
@theunderdog5 wrote:

you cant get banned from your own server lol, i have a word of advice why dont you “SHUT DOWN” aadn tidy up your server and experiment with some of the programming with teleports, starter kits and etc…aswell testing things out like banning and unbanning yourself and other people.

im not trying to be mean but chances are if you cant even unban yoourself you probably dont even know how to adjust and fix your starter kits and etc which means you shouldnt be hosting your server right away at least for the first day or two. I can promise you that if you take a day or two and experiment with programming and your security system for your mods and admins. alittle knowledge can go a long way =D

for instance when i was experimenting on my own server a couple years ago i noticed command in certain files for command such as ::home and ::pvp and etc…

suppose your home is in edgvillle maybe you dont want it in edgville maybe you might want it at the duel arena or somthin maybe you dont want to pvp at varrock maybe you might want to pvp at an agility course.

Like i said i can guarantee you’ll be a good server owner if you take a day or two and figure out and test different things and for you i recommend starting off with your security ban system and etc.

Read full topic
